title: Engineering Lead (MERN Stack)
tagsAndSkills: Solution Architecting,Mern Stack,Javascript,Nosql Databases,Reacts Js,Microservices Development,Node.Js,Angular
jobDescription:
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Architect to lead the design and implementation of cutting-edge applications. This role requires a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, along with the ability to architect complex solutions and drive innovative projects.


Title: Full Stack Developer Architect

Location: Hyderabad

Employment Type: Full Time

Shift: 2 PM - 11 PM

Immediate Joiners Preferred


Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead the solution design and architecture of complex B2B software applications.
  • Design and implement Micro Frontends architecture.
  • Develop and maintain web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js.
  • Develop and maintain hybrid mobile applications using technologies such as React Native or Ionic Framework.
  • Utilize a monorepo with shared code to manage and organize projects.
  • Work with NoSQL databases and ensure optimal performance and scalability.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Solve complex problems related to application performance, security, and scalability.
  • Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and clients.
  • Mentor junior developers and lead technical discussions.

Mandatory Qualifications:

  • Proven experience as a Full Stack Architect or similar role.
  • Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Expertise in React.js or Angular.
  • Extensive experience with Node.js and backend development.
  • Proficient in designing and working with Microservices and Micro Frontends architecture.
  • Experience with Monorepo structures and shared code management.
  • Experience with hybrid mobile application development using React Native or Ionic Framework.
  • Experience with NoSQL databases.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with teams.
  • B.Tech degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.).
  • Knowledge of UX design principles.

About Techolution:

Techolution is a Product Development firm on track to become one of the most admired brands in the world for "innovation done right". Our purpose is to harness our expertise in novel technologies to deliver more profits for our enterprise clients while helping them deliver a better human experience for the communities they serve. With that, we are now fully committed to helping our clients build the enterprise of tomorrow by making the leap from Lab Grade AI to Real World AI.

We are honored to have recently received the prestigious Inc 500 Best In Business award, a testament to our commitment to excellence. While we are big enough to be trusted by some of the greatest brands in the world, we are small enough to care about delivering meaningful ROI-generating innovation at a guaranteed price for each client that we serve.



If you're interested, please send your resume to me at shikha.bhattacharya@techolution.com

title: Software Engineer - Android
tagsAndSkills: Interpersonal skills,Linux,Coding,SQLite,android studio,Android SDK,IOS,Object oriented programming
jobDescription:
• We are looking for experienced & talented Hybrid Mobile App Developer for the post of Software Engineer to join our team
  • Candidates should enjoy working in a challenging environment; have the enthusiasm and ambition to develop & complete projects to the highest standard and want to be part of an organization that puts technology at the heart of everything it does

What are we looking for?
  • Engineers, Graduates / Post Graduates with 1-3 years of experience.
  • Experience in Java programming (Android) SDK, Kotlin, Flutter SDK, and Dart programming.
  • Knowledge in Apple developer account configuration and basic of Xcode and Android Studio IDE.
  • Knowledge in Firebase SDKs is an added advantage.
  • Knowledge of SQLite database, SOAP / REST API.
  • Knowledge on Android development in Linux environment is added advantage.
  • Flutter skillset is preferable & Interest to learn Flutter framework is expected.
  • Good concept of OOP (Object Oriented Programming) and design principles
  • Excellent written & verbal communication skills.
  • Eagerness to learn new versions of Android SDKs and iOS.
Responsibilities
  • Develop and write secured coding for given requirement with adherence to international coding standards
  • Anticipates and resolves potential problems and defining & implementing high level logics.
  • Responsible for guiding the development team.
  • Develop the code using optimizing techniques.
  • Should possess Excellent Communication skill with good interpersonal skills
  • Making sure that the project is being completed effectively on time

title: Software Engineer L2 -Android
jobDescription:
MUST HAVE

  • Proficient in Java,Kotlin and OOPS concept
  • Solid understanding of Android SDK, Android Studio, and related development tools.
  • Hands on experience in Kotlin Flow/Live Data
  • Hands on experience in Jetpack Compose, WorkManager, Room, Navigation
  • Hands on experience in Retrofit
  • Experience with design patterns like MVVM,MVP
  • Hands on experience using HILT/Dagger
  • Experience using Firebase.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration.
  • Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices and different design principles.
  • Understanding of mobile app performance optimization techniques.
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills, with a keen attention to detail.
  • Ability to write unit tests and UI tests using tools such as Junit, Espresso etc.
  • Experience with version control systems, such as Git.
  • Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, Agile environment
  • Passionate about learning, innovation, knowledge sharing, and continuous improvement
  • Passionate for shipping high quality, mobile applications


Responsibilities

  • Design and develop native Android applications from concept to deployment, using the latest Android SDKs and development tools.
  • Convert design specifications into efficient and reliable code, ensuring a seamless user experience.
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to gather requirements and define project scope.
  • Implement robust and scalable application architecture, following best practices and design patterns.
  • Develop clean, maintainable, and well-documented code, adhering to coding standards and guidelines.
  • Actively collaborate with back-end developers to integrate mobile applications with server-side systems and APIs.
  • Optimize application performance, including memory usage, network utilization, and battery consumption.
  • Perform thorough testing and debugging of applications, identifying, and resolving issues and bugs.
  • Ensure compliance with relevant security and data protection standards in application development.
  • Proactively collaborate with the quality assurance team to conduct testing and ensure on time delivery of applications.
  • Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement.
  • Maintain and update existing applications, addressing bug fixes, and implementing new features as needed.
  • Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in Android development, and continuously enhance your technical skills.

title: Princ Software Engineer (ios)
tagsAndSkills: Object oriented design,Mobile application development,Automation,Analytical,Web development,Agile,Unit testing,Technology solutions
jobDescription:
We are looking to Hire a Princ. Software engineer/developer to join our cutting-edge development team as it grows. The ideal candidate is a divergent thinker who understands industry best practices and has experience with the required Programming language. They are a team player possessing strong analytical as well as technical skills and are able to communicate the logic behind technical decisions to non-tech stakeholders. They must be comfortable working in an agile environment and have the ability to take the wheel when necessary .

What You Will Do in This Role

  • Able to build and maintain iOS Applications.

  • Able to work on Cross-Platform Mobile Application Development using frameworks such as React Native.

  • Contribute towards automation for QA.

  • Fast learner who can contribute from day one.

  • Adamant about writing quality, reusable, and performant code

  • Performing Peer Code Reviews expecting the same level of quality and reusability

  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adhere to deadlines.

  • Can rapidly deploy, learn and iterate on new features.

  • Eager to continuously improve skill set.

  • Push the limits to make great things happen.

  • Compulsive need to excel in what you do.

What You ll Need to be Successful in this Role

  • 8+ years of relevant experience.

  • Well-versed in required Technical Skills.

  • Good knowledge of developing iOS Apps using both Swift and Objective-C.

  • Experience in developing on React Native.

  • Experience in Web Development is a plus.

  • Solid understanding of Object-Oriented design and concepts.

  • Good understanding of basic Design Patterns.

  • Experience with unit testing frameworks.

  • Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills.

  • Experience in Mobile Automation.
